description.brazilian: Criar seu primeiro peixe
description.english: Raise your first fish
description.french: « Élever ton premier poisson »
description.german: Zieh deinen ersten Babyfisch auf
description.japanese: 最初の魚を育成する
description.russian: Вырасти свою первую рыбку.
description.schinese: 养成第一条鱼
description.spanish: Cría tu primer pez
description.tchinese: 養成第一條魚

description.brazilian: Equipar uma decoração
description.english: Equip one decoration
description.french: « Équiper une décoration »
description.german: Rüste eine Deko aus
description.japanese: 装飾を1つ装備する
description.russian: Экипируй один декоративный предмет.
description.schinese: 装备一件装饰物
description.spanish: Equipa una decoración
description.tchinese: 裝備一件裝飾物

description.brazilian: Equipar todas as 6 categorias de decoração
description.english: Equip all 6 types of decorations
description.french: « Équiper les 6 types de décorations »
description.german: Rüste alle 6 Arten von Deko aus
description.japanese: すべての6種類の装飾を装備する
description.russian: Экипируй все 6 типов декора.
description.schinese: 装备全部6种类型装饰物
description.spanish: Equipa los 6 tipos de decoraciones
description.tchinese: 裝備全部6種類型裝飾物

description.brazilian: Dobrar a eficiência do Alimentador Automático
description.english: Double the Auto-Feeder's efficiency
description.french: « Doubler l'efficacité du nourrisseur automatique »
description.german: Der automatische Futterspender arbeitet doppelt so effizient
description.japanese: 自動給餌器の給餌効率が2倍になる
description.russian: Удвой эффективность автокормушки.
description.schinese: 自动喂食器喂食效率翻倍
description.spanish: Duplica la eficiencia del Auto Alimentador
description.tchinese: 自動餵食器餵食效率翻倍

description.brazilian: Duplicar o EXP de alimentação
description.english: Double your Feeding EXP
description.french: « Doubler l'EXP de nourrissage »
description.german: Füttern bringt doppelte Erfahrung
description.japanese: 給餌経験値が2倍になる
description.russian: Удвой опыт от кормления.
description.schinese: 喂食经验翻倍
description.spanish: Duplica tu EXP de alimentación
description.tchinese: 餵食經驗翻倍

description.brazilian: “Alcance 100‰ de probabilidade de bônus de EXP de alimentação”
description.english: Reach a 100% Feeding EXP bonus chance
description.french: « Atteindre 100 ‰ de chance de bonus d'EXP de nourrissage »
description.german: Krit. Rate der Fütterungs-EP erreicht 100 ‰
description.japanese: 給餌経験クリティカル率が100‰に到達する
description.russian: Достигни 100‰ шанса крита опыта при кормлении.
description.schinese: 喂食经验爆率达到100‰
description.spanish: Alcanza 100‰ de probabilidad de bono de EXP de alimentación
description.tchinese: 餵食經驗爆率達到100‰

description.brazilian: Desbloquear as três cores de um peixe
